dataList.content:
You have been defeated.
Use <color=#e94d37>40 Lunacy</color> and continue the battle?

<color=#ebcaa2><Effects Applied Upon Continuing></color>
<color=#F8C200>- Reset Identities & E.G.O Per-Encounter Effect Activation Limits
- Gain 10 E.G.O Resources for all Affinities
- Fully restore HP and SP of all allies
(SP of Minus Coin Identities set to -30)</color>

Clearing this Stage by using a Stage Continue function will prevent its Extra Conditions from being fulfilled.
Also, upon clearing the Stage, resources spent to continue this battle will not be restored, and spent Lunacy cannot be refunded.

However, if, after using the Continue function, the player forfeits this Stage or if the game closes due to unusual circumstances, any Lunacy spent to continue this battle will be restored.
Don't show this message again until next login
â€» Free Lunacy is used first.

Clearing the Stage has consumed all resources
spent to Continue the battle.

Forfeiting the Stage has returned all resources
spent to Continue the battle.
